00013          public static void main(String[] arg) throws Exception {
00014 
00015           BufferedReader CSVFile = 
00016                 new BufferedReader(new FileReader("placesQueries.csv"));
00017 
00018           String dataRow = CSVFile.readLine(); // Read first line.
00019           // The while checks to see if the data is null. If 
00020           // it is, we've hit the end of the file. If not, 
00021           // process the data.
00022 
00023           while (dataRow != null){
00024            String[] dataArray = dataRow.split(",");
00025            for (String item:dataArray) { 
00026                    Log.d("item", item + "\t"); 
00027            }
00028            
00029            dataRow = CSVFile.readLine(); // Read next line of data.
00030           }
00031           // Close the file once all data has been read.
00032           CSVFile.close();
00033

00035          } //main()
